short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute and Skip YouTube ads with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

✔ Mute Audio: Instantly mutes the player when an ad is detected.
✔ Disable Video: Temporarily turns off video during ads.
✔ Smart Ad-Skipping: Automatically clicks "Skip Ad" buttons for uninterrupted viewing.
✔ Counter: Open the popup to see the total number of muted ads.
